pages.text: $(l)Stats$()$(li)Price: :coin: 1,024$(li)Milk: Sheep Milk$(li)Milk Cooldown: 2 days$(li)Shear drops: Wool, Fine Wool (50% chance) $(li)Drops: Raw Mutton, Wool$(br2)$(l)Notes$()$(br)Fine Wool only drops at 5+ hearts of affection
A verstile farm animal that has a lot of uses. Less than ideal for milking.
